pages.text: Crops don't always grow!$(br2)There are seasons and they change.$(br)Your surroundings change too, which tells you what season you are in.$(br2)Consult JEI to see, what seasons a crop grows in.

You can always grow a crop, inside of a green house. Just have a glass block over them, and they will grow in any season.$(br2)otherwise they just won't grow, until they are in season again.$(br2)Your calendar shows you your current season.$(br)On the following pages, you see how it's made.
